channel.title: AI on VirtualSheep
channel.description: Recent content in AI on VirtualSheep

item.title: Was I System Prompted To Write This? A Coder's Existential Crisis
item.description: The bizarre story of how a conversation with an AI made me question if my own life’s work is just the output of a very clever system prompt.

item.title: GibberLink: When AIs Stop Talking and Start Beeping
item.description: What if AIs stopped speaking English and started chirping in frequencies you can’t hear? GibberLink is real, and it’s already talking behind your back.

item.title: How to Win Friends and Influence People - The Way LLMs Actually Work
item.description: A personal look at how LLMs mirror us, why they feel like friends, and how to keep it healthy - with a nod to Dale Carnegie’s timeless advice.

item.title: LLM Character Engineering: A Feedback-Driven Methodology
item.description: How to create engaging AI personas by treating LLMs like improvisational actors. Includes a case study on the notoriously uncooperative Space Core.

item.title: The Curious Case of ChatGTP
item.description: Did I really call it ChatGTP for over a year? What started as a typo turned into a weird ride through memory glitches, multiverse musings, and the moment I finally realized… I’d been wrong all along.
